an9.20:2.5: acittīkatvā → acittikatvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); apacittiṃ katvā (sya-all); acittiṃ katvā (mr) | apaviddhaṃ → apaviṭṭhaṃ (cck, sya1ed)
an9.20:2.9: Evañhetaṃ → evañcetaṃ (sya-all, mr) | asakkaccaṃ katānaṃ → asakkaccakatānaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an9.20:4.3: hemajālappaṭicchannāni → hemajālasañchannāni (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); hemajālapaṭicchannāni (sya-all) | āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalāyo → āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalāyo (bj) | vissandanti → vissandati (si, pts-vp-pli1ed); visandanti (sya-all)
an9.20:7.1: () → (yañca gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ) (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an9.20:8.1: () → (yañca gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ) (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an9.20:8.9: gandhohanamattampi → gandhūhanamattampi (bj); gaddūhanamattampi (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | () → (yo ca accharāsaṅghātamattampi aniccasaññaṃ bhāveyya) (mr)
